articles.author: SOCP Indonesia
articles.title: Update SOCP Januari 25 Pencairan Rp1,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana:  Donation to help the organization program called 'Clear Labels, Not Forests' in order for companies to clearly label palm oil in their products instead of previously labeling as vegetable oil thats causing massive deforestations

articles.author: SOCP Indonesia
articles.title: Update SOCP December 27 Pencairan Rp1,000,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: Donate to help the organization to help combat palm oil companies from destorying the orangutan habitat and the rainforest any further.

articles.author: SOCP
articles.title: Update SOCP Deceember 1 Pencairan RP500000000000000,000
articles.description: Rencana Penggunaan Dana Pencairan : Fees to adopt and take care of an orangutan in the facility

articles.author: SOCP Indonesia
articles.title: Update SOCP October 21 Pencairan Rp500,000
articles.description: Rencana Pengunaan Dana: reguler medical check up to one of infant orangutan named Rundeng at Quarantine and Rehablitiation Centre.During their rehabilitation process all of orangutans at our centre alway undergoing rountine medical check up to make sure that they in good condition until they are ready to be released in to the forest.
